article_metadata.generated_for_query: I want to create a technical document

introduction: This article guides you through creating a technical document using our application.  You will learn about the key interface elements and the step-by-step process involved.

key_ui_elements_overview.element_name: Describe the document you want to generate...
key_ui_elements_overview.purpose_or_function: Enter a description of the document to be generated.
Select the data sources for the document.
Captures a screenshot to include as a source.
Attaches a file as a source.
Navigation to the source configuration section.
Navigation to the user profile section.

step_by_step_guide.detailed_instructions: In the 'Describe the document you want to generate...' field, enter a brief description of the technical document you need. For example, you could type 'Technical documentation for the new user onboarding process'.
step_by_step_guide.ui_element_interacted: Describe the document you want to generate...
step_by_step_guide.generic_example_data_entry: For example: "Technical documentation for the new user onboarding process."

step_by_step_guide.detailed_instructions: From the 'Technical Article' dropdown menu, select 'Technical Article'.
Click the 'Select Sources' dropdown menu to choose the relevant sources for your document.  This might include selecting files or other data sources.
Click the 'Generate' button to create the technical document.

summary_and_next_steps: This guide detailed how to generate a technical document.  After generation, review the document and make any necessary revisions.
title: Creating a Technical Document

frequently_asked_questions.answer: The 'Describe the document...' field allows you to provide context for the document generation.  A clear description helps ensure the generated document meets your needs.  For example, you might describe the target audience or the specific information to be included.
frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Describe the document...' field?

frequently_asked_questions.answer: The 'Select Sources' dropdown allows you to specify the input data for the document.  This might include files, screenshots, or other data sources relevant to your technical document.
frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I select the data sources for my document?
